page.title: 18Cockerham Parachute Centre
page.content: The Black Knights Sky-diving team was established in l964 by a group of ex-service men at Bank End Farm Cockerham.All the team have taught themselves and since l964 have been giving displays throughout the U.K. Linked to this they have taught many hundreds of first time parachutists helped with the knowledge and experience they have gained over the years.The team is considered to be the longest established Parachute Display Team in the country with over l0,000 descents between them .In l979 a Ltd.Company was formed with 6 Directors, all British Parachute Association Instructors & members of the team.An aircraft a Cessna l85 was purchased and new buildings & equipment set up on new premises at Patty's Farm, Hillam Lane, Cockerham, Nr. Lancaster.
